urls.title: United Airlines (@united) • Instagram photos and videos
urls.description: United Airlines shared a post on Instagram: "Raise your claws! @WhiteClaw Blackberry has crept its way on board. 😈 And that's not the only treat we have for you this spooky szn. Swipe ➡️ to see the limited-edition White Claw travel koozies five scary-lucky winners will get two of. To enter: 1️⃣: Follow @United and @WhiteClaw 2️⃣: Comment what you're dressing up as this Halloween Enter by 11/1. Open to 21+, U.S. residents only. Winners will be randomly selected and DMd by @United directly on 11/3. No purchase necessary.". Follow their account to see 1306 posts.

data.text: And that's not the only treat we have for you this spooky szn. Head to our Instagram to enter for your chance to win two limited-edition White Claw travel koozies https://t.co/N0qBky27PM
